skills.name: Fire Smash
skills.description: Attacks an enemy with a strong smashing blow. On Critical Hit, this attack will increase your Attack Bar by 30%.

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

skills.name: Hell Fire
skills.description: Attacks all enemies and reduces their Defense for 2 turns with a 70% chance.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skills.name: Meteor
skills.description: Strikes an enemy with a giant meteor, stunning the target and inflicting Continuous Damage on the rest of the enemies for 3 turns.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns
